rules_text:
[i](As an Arena enters, choose an opponent to protect it. You and others can attack it. When it's defeated, exile it, then cast it converted for free.)[/i]
Whenever one or more defense counters are removed from this battle, look at the top card of your library. You may play it without paying its mana cost. Otherwise, put it into your hand.
rules_text2:
Prized Possesions is all colors.
{T}: Add three mana of any colors.
You may look at the top card of your library at any time.
You may play the top card of your library.
